data.title: CURRICULUM VITAE
data.text:
Personal Information

National and International Committees-Societies

1979-1980 Vice-President of the Geological Society of Turkey

1981-1983 President of the Geological Society of Turkey

1990- Sci. Coordinator ? Turkish National. Comm. of Volcanology and Geochem. of the Earths Interior (TUVAK)?.

2000- Chairman Turkish National Committee of IUGS/IGCP

2005- UNESCO National Comm. for Earth Sciences

Languages

English & German

Awards

1996 Golden Hammer Award for Mineralogy-Petrography (Chamber of Turk. Geol. Eng.)

2000 to 2009 ODTU Scientific Performance Award

2001 ODTU Tarik Somer Award

2006 Golden Hammer Award for Mineralogy-Petrography (Chamber of Turk. Geol. Eng.)

2009 Golden Hammer Science Award (Chamber of Turk. Geol. Eng.)

National Committees

1982-1984 President Geological Society of Turkey

1984-1989 MTA Natural History Museum Mineralogy Section

1990- Co-Leader Turkish National Com. Volcanology and Geochem. Earth Inter.

1991- Member of National Counsel TUJJB

1997- UNESCO Int. Union Geol. Sci. Turkish National Committee Member and President.

1998-2001 IUGS-IGCP TÃ¼rk. National Comm. President

2001- President Turk National Assoc. of Geol. Sci.

2005- UNESCO Turk Nat. Commission- Committee for Geology

Grants

1973-1977 Deutsche Akademische Austauschdienst (DAAD)

1980-1981 Carl-Duisberg Gesellschaft (CDG)

Membership

Geological Society of Turkey

Turkish Assoc. of Petroleum Geologists

Geologische Vereinigung Deutschlands

International Federation of Mineralogists

International Association of Mineralogy

Gruppo Ophioliti

International Projects

1979-1984 International Union of Geosciences, International Geological Correlation Program (IGCP)5 "Correlation of Prevariscan and Variscan events of the Alpine-Mediteranean mountain belt" National Leader

1991-1995 International Union of Geosciences, International Geological Correlation Program (IGCP) 276 "Paleozoic geodynamic domains and their alpidic evolution in the Tethys" Regional Leader

1996-1998 NATO Colllaborative Research Project ?Central Anatolian Ophiolites: evolution of diverse Mesozoic oceanic segments? Collaborative Resarch Grant Nr: CRG 960549

1994-1999 International Union of Geosciences, International Geological Correlation Program (IGCP) 351 "Lower Paleozoic evolution of NW Gondwana" National Leader

1998-2004 International Union of Geosciences, International Geological Correlation Program (IGCP) 368 "Proterozoic Events in East Gondwana" National Leader

1999-2004 International Union of Geosciences (IGCP) 421 " North Gondwana bioevent / biogeography patterns in relation to crustal dynamics? National Leader

2005-2009 IGCP ?Ordovician Palaeogeography and Palaeoclimate? IGCP 503 National Leader

2005-2008 NSF-CRG ?Extensional Unroofing of the Central Menderes Metamorphic Complex, Southwestern Turkey? (E. Catlos, 03/01/05 - 02/28/08)

2008-2010 NSF-IRES 04-036 Research Opportunities in Extensional Dynamics for US Undergraduate and Graduate Geosciences Students in Western Turkey (E. Catlos)

2010- ?The Paleothetyan and Neothetyan ophiolite suture zones in Northern Turkey: Study of the Intrapontide Suture Zone and Sakarya Terrane?. Ministero dell'Istruzione dell' UniversitÃ  e della Ricerca-Italya Proje No: 2008ZPC3C8_002

2010- ?The Paleo- and Neo-thetyan ophiolite suture zones in Northern Turkey ?

DARIUS Middle East Basin Evolution Project
